content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded due to missing inventory and resource shortages. No other production facilities were newly created—even though existing furnaces (such as one at (5.0, 5.0) for smelting iron and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)) were referenced in processing, they were not placed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Errors with get_entities
 – Avoid passing unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or supplying positional parameters to a function that requires none. Verify the correct function signature before making calls.
• Lab Placement Failures
 – Ensure that the required Lab item is available in inventory prior to attempting placement at a target position.
• Handling NoneType in Entity Retrieval
 – Validate that entity-retrieval functions do not return None before iterating over results.
• Lab Crafting Shortcomings
 – Confirm that all intermediary components (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are available in sufficient quantities before attempting to craft a Lab. Check that upstream processes (such as smelting and prior crafting steps) have successfully produced these prerequisites.
